## Update2dGroup class

Update group for drawable entities part of a 2d plot.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Update2dGroup<TPlotRange, TUpdateArg, TRequiredTraits> extends AEntityGroup<IUpdateGroupOptions<TUpdateArg>, TRequiredTraits> implements IUpdate2dGroup<TPlotRange, TUpdateArg, TRequiredTraits>
```
